name: 張淑美
objective: 本課程主要介紹各類有機材料在光電工業上之應用。
schedule:
一、 Handouts: 1. AO to MO, 2. 光電產業之有機材料簡介, 3. Advanced OE applications
二、James D. Livingston, “Electronic properties of engineering materials”, 1999, Wiley, ISBN 0-471-31627.
Chapter 11: From bonds to bands – Why grass is green
三、 PLED : R. H. Friend, et al., “Electroluminescence in conjugated polymers”, Nature 1999 397 121; R. H. Friend, et al., “Polymer diodes”, Lasers and optics 1999 35.
materials:
其他　　“Electronic properties of engineering materials”,
